name: aging-research
description: AgingResearchAI - Multi-LLM system for aging and metabolic disease drug discovery. Use for T2D, NAFLD/NASH, Sarcopenia research with literature-grounded claims and ADMET predictions.

examples.user: Search for papers on AMPK and insulin resistance
examples.action: Use RAG to search PubMed and retrieve relevant literature with PMIDs

examples.user: Is metformin's primary mechanism through AMPK activation?
examples.action: Run multi-LLM debate to verify this claim with literature context

examples.user: Check ADMET properties of this compound: CC(=O)Nc1ccc(O)cc1
What are the key pathways in T2D liver pathogenesis?
examples.action: Run pathogenesis discovery pipeline for T2D in liver tissue
